C++:

int bn (int a, int b) {
if(a>b)
return (a);
else
return (b); 
}

void main(){
int a=10; // We can change a and b
int b=-20;// values for testing
 bn(a,b)
}


Mips:
j main
bn: slt $t0, $a1, $a0
beq $t0, $zero, L1
add $v0, $0, $a0
j L2
L1: add $v0, $0, $a1
L2: jr $ra
main:addi $a0, $0, -20
addi $a1, $0 , 10   
jal bn


00001000000000000000000000000111
00000000101001000100000000101010
00010001000000000000000000000010
00000000000001000001000000100000
00001000000000000000000000000110
00000000000001010001000000100000
00000011111000000000000000001000
00100000000001001111111111101100
00100000000001010000000000001010
00001100000000000000000000000001
